channel.title: Abouts on click.
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on click.

item.title: Me
item.description: Hi! I'm clickfanatic. I go by the name Kristine in real life and normally I'm not this blue. I'm a former freelance web designer/PHP developer from the Philippines now focusing on the care of actual human beings a.k.a BS Nursing. I coded this site using Bulma CSS, compiled with SASS, and then ported it to HUGO. I'm currently leeching off Github Pages for hosting cause I'm broke. All the tools I used to build this site are opensource.
